### Waarom Dit Briljant Is

**Single Responsibility**: Deze config doet Ã‰Ã‰N ding - vertellen welke velden op deze pagina horen.

**Zero Duplication**: Alle field-definities leven in de FieldRegistry. Wijzig het label van `aantalMensen`? Doe het Ã©Ã©n keer in de registry, werkt overal.

**Type Safety**: De `fieldId` string wordt gechecked tegen de registry. Typo? TypeScript vangt het.

**Zero Logic**: Geen `if`-statements, geen computed values, geen any-types. Pure data.

### De Data Flow Die Dit Mogelijk Maakt
```
setupHouseholdConfig
  â†“ (geeft fieldId's)
RenderOrchestrator  
  â†“ (haalt definitie uit Registry)
FieldRegistry
  â†“ (retourneert componentType, label, constraints)
FieldRenderer
  â†“ (tekent het veld)
Screen
```

// scripts/validate-configs.ts
import { FIELD_REGISTRY } from '@domain/registry/FieldRegistry';
import { setupHouseholdConfig } from '@ui/screens/Wizard/pages/1setupHousehold.config';

const allFieldIds = setupHouseholdConfig.fields.map(f => f.fieldId);
const unknownFields = allFieldIds.filter(id => !FIELD_REGISTRY[id]);

if (unknownFields.length > 0) {
  console.error('Unknown fields:', unknownFields);
  process.exit(1);
}

console.log('âœ“ All fields exist in registry');
```

 * TODO: Verplaats GENDER_OPTIONS en BURGERLIJKE_OPTIONS naar @domain/constants/options.ts
 */

export const detailsHouseholdConfig = {
  pageId: UI_SECTIONS.HOUSEHOLD_DETAILS,
  titleToken: UX_TOKENS.PAGES.HOUSEHOLD_DETAILS,
  fields: [
    {
      fieldId: 'burgerlijkeStaat',
      type: 'chip-group',
      labelToken: 'LABEL_BURGERLIJKE_STAAT',
      requiresVisibilityCheck: true,
      visibilityRule: 'showMaritalStatus' // Alleen bij > 1 volwassene
    },
    {
      fieldId: 'woningType',
      type: 'chip-group',
      labelToken: 'LABEL_WONING_TYPE'
    },
    {
      fieldId: 'postcode',
      type: 'number',
      labelToken: 'LABEL_POSTCODE',
      requiresVisibilityCheck: true,
      visibilityRule: 'showPostcode'
    },
    {
      fieldId: 'members',
      type: 'repeater',
      labelToken: 'LABEL_LEDEN_LIJST',
      itemFields: [
        { fieldId: 'naam', type: 'text', labelToken: UX_TOKENS.FIELDS.NAME },
        { fieldId: 'leeftijd', type: 'number', labelToken: UX_TOKENS.FIELDS.AGE },
        { 
          fieldId: 'gender', 
          type: 'chip-group', 
          labelToken: 'LABEL_GENDER' 
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
};
```

### Waarom Dit Briljant Is

**Single Responsibility**: Deze config doet Ã‰Ã‰N ding - vertellen welke velden op deze pagina horen.

**Zero Duplication**: Alle field-definities leven in de FieldRegistry. Wijzig het label van `aantalMensen`? Doe het Ã©Ã©n keer in de registry, werkt overal.

**Type Safety**: De `fieldId` string wordt gechecked tegen de registry. Typo? TypeScript vangt het.

**Zero Logic**: Geen `if`-statements, geen computed values, geen any-types. Pure data.

### De Data Flow Die Dit Mogelijk Maakt
```
setupHouseholdConfig
  â†“ (geeft fieldId's)
RenderOrchestrator  
  â†“ (haalt definitie uit Registry)
FieldRegistry
  â†“ (retourneert componentType, label, constraints)
FieldRenderer
  â†“ (tekent het veld)
Screen
```

// scripts/validate-configs.ts
import { FIELD_REGISTRY } from '@domain/registry/FieldRegistry';
import { setupHouseholdConfig } from '@ui/screens/Wizard/pages/1setupHousehold.config';

const allFieldIds = setupHouseholdConfig.fields.map(f => f.fieldId);
const unknownFields = allFieldIds.filter(id => !FIELD_REGISTRY[id]);

if (unknownFields.length > 0) {
  console.error('Unknown fields:', unknownFields);
  process.exit(1);
}

console.log('âœ“ All fields exist in registry');
```

// scripts/validate-configs.ts
import { FIELD_REGISTRY } from '@domain/registry/FieldRegistry';
import { setupHouseholdConfig } from '@ui/screens/Wizard/pages/1setupHousehold.config';

const allFieldIds = setupHouseholdConfig.fields.map(f => f.fieldId);
const unknownFields = allFieldIds.filter(id => !FIELD_REGISTRY[id]);

if (unknownFields.length > 0) {
  console.error('Unknown fields:', unknownFields);
  process.exit(1);
}

console.log('âœ“ All fields exist in registry');
```
